Text:
Hello!

I would greatly appreciate if you could create a torrent for the following textbooks:

Essentials of Cultural Anthropology by Bailey (2nd edition, 2011)http://www.amazon.com/Essentials-Cultural-Anthropology-Garrick-Bailey/dp/0840032757

and

Cultural Landscape: Intro to Human Geography by Rubenstein (10th edition, 2011)
http://www.amazon.com/The-Cultural-Landscape-Introduction-Geography/dp/0321677358

I really can't put into words how great of a service you are doing for the education-seeking community. THANK YOU VERY MUCH SIR!

I don't have these 2 titles. Sorry.

TPB has: 
 - Peoples & Bailey's Humanity: An Introduction to Cultural Anthropology 9th (uploader: _F1_)
 - Scupin DeCorse Anthropology Global Perspective 7th (uploader: dynstab2)

www.LibraryPirate.me has:
 - cultural anthropology,5e(barbara miller,prentice hall,2009)
 - Cultural Anthropology: The Human Challenge / Edition 13 by William A. Haviland et al

On LibraryPirate, you must register and be logged in to access the private tracker that allows download.
